lead_paragraph: When Scott J. Kelly returns to Earth next week after 340 days in space, he will be studied for insights into the health issues long space flights, like to Mars, might pose.

headline.print_headline: Astronaut Set to Return After Nearly a Year in Space
headline.main: Scott Kelly Poised to Set NASA Record for Consecutive Days in Space

snippet: When Scott J. Kelly returns to Earth next week after 340 days in space, he will be studied for insights into the health issues long space flights, like to Mars, might pose.
abstract: NASA astronaut Scott J Kelly reflects on his stay at International Space Station in news conference broadcast from station; Kelly will have spent 340 consecutive days in space, record for NASA astronaut, when he returns from space station.
